General.AllowPiwikArchivingToTriggerBrowser: Archive reports when viewed from the browser
General.ArchivingInlineHelp: For medium to high traffic websites, it is recommended to disable Matomo archiving to trigger from the browser. Instead, we recommend that you setup a cron job to process Matomo reports every hour.
General.ArchivingTriggerDescription: Recommended for larger Matomo installs, you need to %1$ssetup a cron job%2$s to process the reports automatically.
General.ArchivingTriggerSegment: Using Custom Segments will still trigger processing of archives.
General.BrokenDownReportDocumentation: It is broken down into various reports, which are displayed in sparklines at the bottom of the page. You can enlarge the graphs by clicking on the report you'd like to see.
General.ChangeTagCloudView: Please note, that you can view the report in other ways than as a tag cloud. Use the controls at the bottom of the report to do so.
General.ChooseDate: Choose date, currently selected date is: %s
General.ColumnActionsPerVisitDocumentation: The average number of actions (page views, site searches, downloads or outlinks) that were performed during the visits.
General.ColumnAverageGenerationTimeDocumentation: The average time it took to generate the page. This metric includes the time it took the server to generate the web page, plus the time it took for the visitor to download the response from the server. A lower 'Avg. generation time' means a faster website for your visitors!
General.ColumnAverageTimeOnPageDocumentation: The average amount of time visitors spent on this page (only the page, not the entire website).
General.ColumnAvgTimeOnSiteDocumentation: The average duration of a visit.
General.ColumnBounceRateDocumentation: The percentage of visits that only had a single pageview. This means, that the visitor left the website directly from the entrance page.
General.ColumnBouncesDocumentation: Number of visits that started and ended on this page. This means that the visitor left the website after viewing only this page.
General.ColumnConversionRateDocumentation: The percentage of visits that triggered a goal conversion.
General.ColumnEntrancesDocumentation: Number of visits that started on this page.
General.ColumnExitRateDocumentation: The percentage of visits that left the website after viewing this page.
General.ColumnExitsDocumentation: Number of visits that ended on this page.
General.ColumnNbActionsDocumentation: The number of actions performed by your visitors. Actions can be page views, internal site searches, downloads or outlinks.
General.ColumnNbUniqVisitorsDocumentation: The number of unduplicated visitors coming to your website. Every user is only counted once, even if they visit the website multiple times a day.
General.ColumnNbUsersDocumentation: The number of users logged in your website. It is the number of unique active users that have a User ID set (via the Tracking code function 'setUserId').
General.ColumnNbVisitsDocumentation: If a visitor comes to your website for the first time or if they visit a page more than 30 minutes after their last page view, this will be recorded as a new visit.
General.ColumnPageBounceRateDocumentation: The percentage of visits that started on this page and left the website straight away.
General.ColumnPageviewsDocumentation: The number of times this page was visited.
General.ColumnSumVisitLength: Total time spent by visitors (in seconds)
General.ColumnUniquePageviewsDocumentation: The number of visits that included this page. If a page was viewed multiple times during one visit, it is only counted once.
General.ColumnViewedAfterSearchDocumentation: The number of times this Page was visited after a visitor did a search on your website, and clicked on this page in the search results.
General.CompareDatesParamMustMatchComparePeriods: %1$s query parameter length must match %2$s query parameter length.
General.ComparisonCardTooltip1: '%1$s' on %2$s contains %3$s of all visits (%4$s out of %5$s total).
General.ComparisonCardTooltip2: The visit count is different by %1$s compared to %2$s over %3$s.
General.ComparisonRatioTooltip: This is a %1$s change compared to the '%2$s' segment on %3$s.
General.ComputedMetricCountWithValueDocumentatio: The number of entries that have a value set for %s
General.ComputedMetricRateDocumentation: The ratio of "%1$s" out of all "%2$s".
General.ConfigFileIsNotWritable: The Matomo configuration file %1$s is not writable, some of your changes might not be saved. %2$s Please change permissions of the config file to make it writable.
General.CurrentlyUsingUnsecureHttp: You are currently using Matomo over unsecure HTTP. This can make your Matomo vulnerable to security exploits. You may also be in breach of privacy laws, as some features including opt-out cookies will not work. We recommend you set up Matomo to use SSL (HTTPS) for improved security.
General.DataForThisGraphHasBeenPurged: The data for this graph is more than %s months old and has been purged.
General.DataForThisTagCloudHasBeenPurged: The data for this tag cloud is more than %s months old and has been purged.
General.DisplayTableWithGoalMetrics: Display a table with Goals metrics
General.DisplayTableWithMoreMetrics: Display a table with Visitor engagement metrics
General.DoubleClickToChangePeriod: Double click to apply this period.
General.DownloadFail_FileExistsContinue: Trying to continue the download for %s, but a fully downloaded file already exists!
General.DownloadFail_HttpRequestFail: Could not download the file! Something might be wrong with the website you're downloading from. You could try again later or get the file by yourself.
General.DownloadPleaseRemoveExisting: If you want it to be replaced, please remove the existing file.
General.EcommerceVisitStatusDesc: Visit Ecommerce status at the end of the visit
General.EcommerceVisitStatusEg: For example, to select all visits that have made an Ecommerce order, the API request would contain %s
General.EncryptedSmtpTransport: Enter the transport layer encryption required by your SMTP server.
General.ErrorRequest: Oops… there was a problem during the request. Maybe the server had a temporary issue, or maybe you requested a report with too much data. Please try again. If this error occurs repeatedly please %1$scontact your Matomo administrator%2$s for assistance.
General.ErrorRateLimit: Oops… too many requests. This happens when you exceed the number of allowed requests to the API for a certain time period.
General.ErrorRequestFaqLink: See the steps to resolve this issue in the FAQ.
General.ExceptionCapabilityAccessWebsite: You can't access this resource as it requires %1$s capability for the website id = %2$d.
General.ExceptionCheckUserHasSuperUserAccessOrIs: The user has to be either a Super User or the user '%s' itself.
General.ExceptionConfigurationFileExistsButNotRe: The config file %s seems to exist but Matomo could not read it.
General.ExceptionConfigurationFileNotFound: The configuration file {%s} has not been found or could not be read.
General.ExceptionConfigurationFilePleaseCheckRea: Please check that %1$s is readable by the user '%2$s'.
General.ExceptionContactSupportGeneric: If you still have this issue please %1$scontact your Matomo administrator%2$s for assistance.
General.ExceptionDatabaseVersion: Your %1$s version is %2$s but Matomo requires at least %3$s.
General.ExceptionDatabaseVersionNewerThanCodebas: Your Matomo codebase is running the old version %1$s and we have detected that your Matomo Database has already been upgraded to the newer version %2$s.
Maybe your Matomo administrators are currently finishing the upgrade process. Please try again in a few minutes.
General.ExceptionIncompatibleClientServerVersion: Your %1$s client version is %2$s which is incompatible with server version %3$s.
General.ExceptionInvalidAggregateReportsFormat: Aggregate reports format '%1$s' not valid. Try any of the following instead: %2$s.
General.ExceptionInvalidArchiveTimeToLive: Today archive time to live must be a number of seconds greater than zero
General.ExceptionInvalidDateBeforeFirstWebsite: The date '%1$s' is a date before first website was online. Try date that's after %2$s (timestamp %3$s).
General.ExceptionInvalidDateFormat: Date format must be: %1$s or any keyword supported by the %2$s function (see %3$s for more information)
General.ExceptionInvalidDateRange: The date '%1$s' is not a correct date range. It should have the following format: %2$s.
General.ExceptionInvalidPeriod: The period '%1$s' is not supported. Try any of the following instead: %2$s
General.ExceptionInvalidRendererFormat: Renderer format '%1$s' not valid. Try any of the following instead: %2$s.
General.ExceptionInvalidReportRendererFormat: Report format '%1$s' not valid. Try any of the following instead: %2$s.
General.ExceptionInvalidStaticGraphType: Static graph type '%1$s' not valid. Try any of the following instead: %2$s.
General.ExceptionSecurityCheckFailed: We're sorry, but the action you were trying to perform failed due to a security check. This is a standard measure to ensure the safety and security of your account. Please try again, and if the issue persists, please contact our support team for further assistance.
General.ExceptionMethodNotFound: The method '%1$s' does not exist or is not available in the module '%2$s'.
General.ExceptionNonceMismatch: Could not verify the security token on this form.
General.ExceptionNotSupportedBrowserText: Due to security issues your browser is not supported. Please upgrade to a newer version.
General.ExceptionPrivilege: You can't access this resource as it requires a %s access.
General.ExceptionPrivilegeAccessWebsite: You can't access this resource as it requires %1$s access for the website id = %2$d.
General.ExceptionPrivilegeAtLeastOneWebsite: You can't access this resource as it requires %s access for at least one website.
General.ExceptionReportNotEnabled: The requested report is not enabled. This means usually either the plugin that defines the report is deactivated or you do not have enough permission to access this report.
General.ExceptionReportNotFound: The requested report does not exist.
General.ExceptionUnexpectedDirectory: Directories were found in your Matomo, but we didn't expect them.
General.ExceptionUnexpectedDirectoryPleaseDelete: Please delete these directories to prevent errors.
General.ExceptionUnexpectedFile: Files were found in your Matomo, but we didn't expect them.
General.ExceptionUnexpectedFilePleaseDelete: Please delete these files to prevent errors.
General.ExceptionUnreadableFileDisabledMethod: The configuration file {%1$s} could not be read. Your host may have disabled %2$s.
General.ExceptionWidgetNotEnabled: The requested widget is not enabled. This means usually either the plugin that defines the widget is deactivated or you do not have enough permission to access this widget.
General.ExceptionWidgetNotFound: The requested widget does not exist.
General.ExpandDataTableFooter: Change the visualization or configure the report
General.ExportThisReport: Export this dataset in other formats
General.FileIntegrityWarning: File integrity check failed and reported some errors. You should fix this issue and then refresh this page until it shows no error.
General.FileIntegrityWarningReupload: Errors below may be due to a partial or failed upload of Matomo files.
General.FileIntegrityWarningReuploadBis: Try to reupload all the Matomo files in BINARY mode.
General.ForceSSLRecommended: We recommend using Matomo over secure SSL connections only. To prevent insecure access over http, add %1$s to the %2$s section in your Matomo config/config.ini.php file.
General.GraphHelp: More information about displaying graphs in Matomo.
General.HelpReport: Click to display help info about this report
General.HelpTranslatePiwik: Maybe you would like to %1$shelp us improve the Matomo translations%2$s?
General.IfArchivingIsFastYouCanSetupCronRunMoreO: Assuming archiving is fast for your setup, you can set up the crontab to run more frequently.
General.InvalidDateRange: Invalid Date Range, Please Try Again
General.MatomoIsACollaborativeProjectYouCanContr:
%1$sMatomo%2$s, formerly known as Piwik, is a collaborative project brought to you by the %7$sMatomo team%8$s members as well as many other contributors around the globe.
If you're a fan of Matomo, you can help: find out %3$sHow to participate in Matomo%4$s, or %5$sdonate now%6$s to help fund the next great Matomo release!
General.MaximumNumberOfPeriodsComparedIs: The maximum number of periods that can be compared simultaneously is %s.
General.MaximumNumberOfSegmentsComparedIs: The maximum number of segments that can be compared simultaneously is %s.
General.MediumToHighTrafficItIsRecommendedTo: For medium to high traffic websites, we recommend to process reports for today at most every half hour (%1$s seconds) or every hour (%2$s seconds).
General.Name: Name
General.NameShownInTheSenderColumn: The name shown in the sender column
General.NewReportsWillBeProcessedByCron: When Matomo archiving is not triggered by the browser, new reports will be processed by the crontab.
General.NoDataForTagCloud: No data for this tag cloud.
General.NotPossibleWithoutHttps: Attention: Doing this without having set up a SSL certificate for using HTTPS will break Matomo.
General.OnlyEnterIfRequired: Only enter a username if your SMTP server requires it.
General.OnlyEnterIfRequiredPassword: Only enter a password if your SMTP server requires it.
General.OnlyUsedIfUserPwdIsSet: Only used if a username/password is set, ask your provider if you are unsure which method to use.
General.OptionalSmtpPort: Optional. Defaults to 25 for unencrypted and TLS SMTP, and 465 for SSL SMTP.
General.OverlayRowActionTooltip: See analytics data directly on your website (opens new tab)
General.ParameterMustIntegerBetween: Parameter %1$s must be an integer value between %2$s and %3$s.
General.PiwikCannotBeUpgradedBecausePhpIsTooOld: Matomo cannot be upgraded to the latest major version because your PHP version is too old.
General.PiwikXIsAvailablePleaseNotifyPiwikAdmin: %1$s is available. Please notify the %2$sMatomo administrator%3$s.
General.PleaseUpgradeYourPhpVersionSoYourPiwikDa: Please upgrade your PHP version to at least PHP %s so your Matomo analytics data stays secure.
General.RearchiveTimeIntervalOnlyForTodayReports: This affects only reports for today (or any other Date Range including today)
General.ReportGeneratedFrom: This report was generated using data from %s.
General.ReportsContainingTodayWillBeProcessedAtM: Archive reports at most every X seconds
General.ReportsWillBeProcessedAtMostEveryHour: Reports will therefore be processed at most every hour.
General.RequestTimedOut: A data request to %s timed out. Please try again.
General.RowEvolutionRowActionTooltip: See how the metrics for this row changed over time
General.SaveImageOnYourComputer: To save the image on your computer, right click on the image and select "Save Image As…"
General.SeeTheOfficialDocumentationForMoreInform: See the %1$sofficial documentation%2$s for more information.
General.SelectYesIfYouWantToSendEmailsViaServer: Select "Yes" if you want or have to send e-mail via a named server instead of the local mail function
General.SmallTrafficYouCanLeaveDefault: For small traffic websites, you can leave the default %s seconds, and access all reports in real time.
General.SmtpFromEmailHelp:
The default value is noreply@{DOMAIN}, where {DOMAIN} will be replaced with your Matomo domain "%1$s".
If sending mails doesn't work for you, you might need to set this address to match your SMTP username.
General.StatisticsAreNotRecorded: Matomo Visitor Tracking is currently disabled! Re-enable tracking by setting record_statistics = 1 in your config/config.ini.php file.
General.SparklineTooltipUsedPeriod: Each data point in the sparkline represents a %s.

General.UsePlusMinusIconsDocumentation: Use the plus and minus icons on the left to navigate.
General.UseSSLInstall: We recommend using Matomo over secure SSL connections only. Please %1$sclick here continue the installation process over SSL%2$s.
General.ValidatorErrorCharacterTooLong: The value contains "%1$s" characters but should contain at most %2$s characters.
General.ValidatorErrorCharacterTooShort: The value contains "%1$s" characters but needs to contain at least %2$s characters.
General.ValidatorErrorEmptyValue: A value needs to be provided.
General.ValidatorErrorInvalidDateTimeFormat: The date "%1$s" does not have the correct format, please use %2$s
General.ValidatorErrorNoValidRegex: The value "%s" is not a valid regular expression.
General.ValidatorErrorNotANumber: The value is not a number.
General.ValidatorErrorNotEmailLike: The value "%s" does not look like a valid email.
General.ValidatorErrorNotUrlLike: The value "%s" does not look like a URL.
General.ValidatorErrorNumberTooHigh: The value "%1$s" is too high. The value should be at most %2$s
General.ValidatorErrorNumberTooLow: The value "%1$s" is too low. The value needs to be at least %2$s.
General.ValidatorErrorXNotWhitelisted: The value "%1$s" is not allowed, use one of: %2$s.
General.ViewAccessRequired: The token_auth used has too much access to be used in a non-API request URL. Please use an app specific password for a user that only has view access.
General.VisitConvertedGoal: Visit converted at least one Goal
General.VisitConvertedGoalId: Visit converted a specific Goal Id
General.VisitConvertedGoalName: Visit converted a specific Goal Name
General.VisitTypeExample: For example, to select all visitors who have returned to the website, including those who have bought something in their previous visits, the API request would contain %s
General.VisualizationDoesNotSupportComparison: This visualization does not support segment/period comparison.
General.WarningDebugOnDemandEnabled: Tracker %1$s mode is enabled. For security reasons this should be enabled only for a short time frame. To disable it set %2$s to %3$s in %4$s
General.WarningDevelopmentModeOnButNotGitInstall: You are currently using Matomo in development mode, but it was not installed through git. It's not recommended to use Matomo in development mode in production environment.
General.WarningFileIntegrityNoManifest: File integrity check could not be performed due to missing manifest.inc.php.
General.WarningFileIntegrityNoManifestDeployingF: If you are deploying Matomo from Git, this message is normal.
General.WarningFileIntegrityNoMd5file: File integrity check could not be completed due to missing md5_file() function.
General.WarningPasswordStored: %1$sWarning:%2$s This password will be stored in the config file visible to everybody who can access it.
General.WarningPhpVersionXIsTooOld: The PHP version %s you are using has reached its End of Life (EOL). You are strongly urged to upgrade to a current version, as using this version may expose you to security vulnerabilities and bugs that have been fixed in more recent versions of PHP.
General.WarningPiwikWillStopSupportingPHPVersion: Matomo will stop supporting PHP %1$s in the next major version. Upgrade your PHP to at least PHP %2$s, before it's too late!
General.YouAreViewingDemoMessage: You are viewing the demo of %1$sMatomo%2$s
General.YouMustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this functionality.
General.YouMustUpgradePhpVersionToReceiveLatestP: You must upgrade your PHP version in order to receive the latest Matomo update.
General.YourSessionHasExpired: Your session has expired due to inactivity. Please log in to continue.

Mobile.AskForAnonymousTrackingPermission: When enabled, Matomo Mobile will send anonymous usage data to matomo.org. The intent is to use this data to help Matomo Mobile developers better understand how the app is used. Information sent is: menus and settings clicked on, OS name and version, any error displayed in Matomo Mobile. We will NOT track any of your analytics data. This anonymous data will never be made public. You can disable/enable anonymous tracking in Settings at any time.
Mobile.ConfirmRemoveAccount: Do you want to remove this account?
Mobile.EnterAuthCodeExplanation: It looks like you may be using two-factor authentication. Please enter the six-digit code to log in to your account.
Mobile.ExceptionNoViewAccess: Please check your username and password and make sure you have %s access for at least one website.
Mobile.HelpUsToImprovePiwikMobile: Would you like to enable anonymous usage tracking in Matomo Mobile?
Mobile.HowtoDeleteAnAccount: Press long to remove an account.
Mobile.HowtoDeleteAnAccountOniOS: Swipe right to left to delete an account
Mobile.HowtoExitAndroid: Please click BACK again to exit
Mobile.HowtoLoginAnonymous: Leave username and password empty for anonymous login
Mobile.HttpIsNotSecureWarning: Your Matomo authorization token (token_auth) is sent in clear text if you use 'HTTP'. For this reason we recommend HTTPS for secure transport of data over the internet. Do you want to proceed?
Mobile.IncompatiblePiwikVersion: The Matomo version you are using is incompatible with Matomo Mobile 2. Update your Matomo installation and try again or install Matomo Mobile 1.
Mobile.LoginToPiwikToChangeSettings: Login to your Matomo server to create and update websites, users or to change General Settings like "Report to load by default".
Mobile.NetworkErrorWithStatusCode: There was an error "%1$s". The request returned the status "%2$s". URL was "%3$s". Please check your entered URL and the error logs on this server for more information about the error and how to resolve it.
Mobile.NoAccountIsSelected: You have to select an account. Add a new account if you haven't configured one.
Mobile.PossibleSslErrorExplanation: An error occurred that could be caused by an invalid or self signed certificate: "%s". Login might work for you when ignoring SSL validation but it is less secure. You can change SSL validation at any time in the settings.
Mobile.RatingPleaseRateUs: Matomo Mobile App is a Free Software, we would really appreciate if you took 1 minute to rate the app in the %1$s. If you have suggestions of new features or bug reports, please contact %2$s
Mobile.RestrictedCompatibilityExplanation: The Matomo version %s you are using is not fully supported by Matomo Mobile 2. You may experience some bugs. We recommend to either update Matomo to the latest version or to use Matomo Mobile 1.
Mobile.SaveSuccessError: Matomo URL or username and password combination is wrong.
Mobile.UseSearchBarHint: Only the first %s websites are displayed here. Please use the search bar to access your other websites.
Mobile.VerifyLoginData: Make sure your username and password combination is correct.

RowEvolution.CompareDocumentation:
Click the link below and open this popup for another row from the same table to compare multiple records.
Use shift-click to mark the row for comparison without opening this popup.
RowEvolution.Documentation: Click the metrics to display them in the large evolution graph. Use shift-click to display multiple metrics at once.
RowEvolution.MetricMinMax: %1$s ranged between %2$s and %3$s over the period
